PIZFiniteState Struct Reference

#include <pizFiniteState.h>

PIZFiniteStateNode * stock

Detailed Description

Remarks:
Implemented with an array of bounded queues, one per alphabet's value (alphabet is 0-127). Bounded queues contains indexes of pre-allocated nodes (pool size is 128).

Field Documentation

long PIZFiniteState::count

Number of nodes in the automaton.

long PIZFiniteState::shuttle

Index of the playback head.

long PIZFiniteState::lotteryIndex

Number of elements in the lottery array.

long PIZFiniteState::jumpChance

Cumulative chance to jump when reading.

long PIZFiniteState::thresholdToMergeNodes

Number of nodes to start crossing-over.

long* PIZFiniteState::lottery

Temporary array for lottery drawing.

PIZBoundedQueue** PIZFiniteState::mapByValue

Pointer to the array of bounded queues.

PIZBoundedStack* PIZFiniteState::ticketMachine

Pool management.

PIZFiniteStateNode* PIZFiniteState::stock

Pool of nodes.
